channel.title: IATI and blended finance transparency
channel.description: I just got sent a [survey](https://survey2018.oecd.org/Survey.aspx?s=a0e3f03193004b01891f26cc01d846e9) where the '[THK Roadmap OECD/SDG etc group](http://www.oecd.org/dac/financing-sustainable-development/development-finance-topics/tri-hita-karana-roadmap-for-blended-finance.htm)' are looking for suggestions about how to improve the transparency of blended finance - and I think IATI is probably a great fit for their needs - is someone at the IATI secretariat able to reach out to them on to see it can happen?

item.title: IATI and blended finance transparency
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
I just got sent a survey where the ‘THK Roadmap OECD/SDG etc group’ are looking for suggestions about how to improve the transparency of blended finance - and I think IATI is probably a great fit for their needs - is someone at the IATI secretariat able to reach out to them on to see it can happen?

Read full topic
